name: Vestige Cognitive Memory
description: Shared cognitive memory for OpenClaw agents powered by Vestige â€” FSRS-6 spaced repetition, dual-strength memory, and prediction error gating. Includes content provenance taint tracking and security policy enforcement.
author: BigHat Biosciences

authToken.description: Bearer token for Vestige API authentication

taintPolicy.description: Default policy mode per taint level. Modes: allow (no restrictions), confirm (block + approval codes), restrict (silently remove, no override), Must be monotonically non-decreasing in strictness.

toolOverrides.description: Per-tool policy overrides. Key = tool name (lowercase). Value = object mapping taint levels (or '*') to modes. Overrides can only make things STRICTER than the taint-level default. Example: { "gateway": { "local": "restrict" }, "read": { "*": "allow" } }

approvalTtlSeconds.description: How long an approval code is valid (default: 60)

maxIterations.description: Max agent loop iterations before blocking the turn (default: 10)
